title: Ranked
body:
Hi Guys
I am about to be demoted as I have lost three games on 0 league points in silver five. And guess what I am being trolled. This is before the game has started. But I have a Nidalee jg, a Ekko mid, a Twisted Fate ADC and a Jax support. Riot please don't match me with these people ever again O.O back to bronze for me :(

replies.body:
its extremely difficult to drop tiers. you have to lose like A LOT in order to drop back into Bronze.

That team sounds awesome. Maybe don't be so negative and it would work out ok, rather than just chalking it off as a loss.

Nidalee is one of the strongest junglers around.
Ekko is ok.
TF ADC can work (just look at TF Jungle)
and Jax support is something new.

I've seen pro players test out "fighter" supports. Olaf, Renekton, Irelia... can work.
Nidalee jungle and Ekko mid are pretty regular roles, TF ADC and Jax support is weird though

In case you don't know already, you don't lose MMR from dodging... your LP can go negative, but your MMR will stay the same. I'm pretty sure you can't get demoted from dodging either, but I'm not 100%
I bet you win. If you lose though, it's probably because you picked a champ that you have only played 1 game with
I just havent been winning since yesterday and the day before :/
